content: I think the new update is confusing. Some buttons don’t work as expected and it’s hard to navigate through the menus quickly.
Could you add a dark mode? My eyes hurt when using the app at night, and a dark theme would make it much more comfortable.
Sometimes the app crashes randomly, especially when I try to upload a file or switch between sections, which can be really frustrating.
Love the idea but the notifications are annoying. They pop up too often and sometimes cover the content I’m trying to read.
Please allow more character limit in messages. I often run out of space when trying to explain my thoughts completely, which is annoying.
The signup process could be faster. Waiting for confirmation emails or extra steps slows everything down and can be discouraging.
